item.title: Kubectl
item.description: check cgroup memory ls -l /sys/fs/cgroup/memory | grep system.slice get po sort by age kubectl get pod --sort-by=.metadata.creationTimestamp get po group by hostname kubectl get po -o wide | awk '{print $7}' | sort | uniq -c port forward kubectl port-forward svc/airflow-webserver 8080:8080 --namespace airflow upsert configmap kubectl create configmap foo --from-file foo.properties -o yaml --dry-run | kubectl apply -f -
